description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Step into the boots of 2nd Lt Jacob Hanson in Zombie Armageddon, a tower defense game combining innovative gameplay and a cinematic "boy meets zombies" storyline. 11 progressive levels of zombie mayhem, plus an unlimited "Onslaught" mode to tax players' defensive strategies and intestinal fortitude.  Now updated with more money to start and Level Select feature!
description.short: Step into the boots of 2nd Lt Jacob Hanson in Zombie Armageddon, a tower defense game combining innovative gameplay and a cinematic "boy meets zombies" storyline. 11 progressive levels of zombie mayhem, plus an unlimited "Onslaught" mode to tax players' defensive strategies and intestinal fortitude.  Now updated with more money to start and Level Select feature!
